graph.original_query: I want to know the features for Mahindra XUV 3XO, and I also want comprehensive details on luxury and safety features. Use a single step for Retriever Agent but use multiple iterations (call_self=true) in a single step to fetch detailed information, In the final iteration of the Retriever Agent combine outputs from current and previous iterations as final step output

output.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to gather comprehensive details on the Mahindra XUV 3XO features, focusing on standard, luxury, and safety features. Since the request specifies using multiple iterations and combining outputs, I'll start with a broad search and then refine it in subsequent calls. I will use `call_self: true` for the first iteration and set `next_instruction` to guide the subsequent search.

With its premium interior and robust powertrains, the XUV3OO caters to urban drivers and adventure seekers alike. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. While it faces competition from models like the Tata Nexon, Kia Sonet, and Hyundai Venue, its unique offerings like a powerful diesel engine and advanced safety features help it carve out its own niche. However, the small SUV space is as competitive as it is abundant, and the 3XO will not only go toe-to-toe with the Tiggo 4, but also its rivals including the likes of the MG ZS, GWM Haval Jolion and Hyundai Venue. With prices starting from $23,990 drive away for the entry-level AX5L trim level, The Mahindra XUV 3XO arrives as one of the most competitively priced offerings in the segment. The styling is angular and striking, sporting a diamond theme most evident in the headlight design, the accents placed on the exterior trim including on the tail lights, roof rails and rear bumper, and the diamond cut alloy wheels. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. luxury_features.text: [{'url': 'https://auto.mahindra.com/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-amc-Library/default/dw14bf6b46/X3XO/XUV3XOProductBrochure-01-07-24.pdf', 'content': "[error] 'charmap' codec can't encode characters in position 195-196: character maps to <undefined>", 'rank': 1}, {'url': 'https://ackodrive.com/car-guide/mahindra-xuv-3xo-features-explained/', 'content': 'HOME BUY NEW CAR BLOG Home / Articles / Car Guide / Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. blend of stylish design, powerful performance, and cutting-edge features. With its premium interior and robust powertrains, the XUV3OO caters to urban drivers and adventure seekers alike. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. While it faces competition from models like the Tata Nexon, Kia Sonet, and Hyundai Venue, its unique offerings like a powerful diesel engine and advanced safety features help it carve out its own niche. Mahindra XUV 3XO Pros A truly premium crossover. Nice build, quality & refinement levels Cabin has enough space for 5. Quality-wise, the interior is more like a Hyundai Fantastic petrol & diesel engine line-up; they offer fast performance & good driveability Finally gets a smooth torque converter automatic with the turbo-petrol engines Wide variant spread ensures there's something for everyone A compliant ride with sorted road manners 5-star NCAP rating & kit. Level 2 ADAS, 6 airbags, ESP, ABS, all-wheel disc brakes, TPMS, seatbelt reminders for all & more Loaded to the gills with equipment (360-degree camera, big sunroof, drive modes, Harman Kardon audio system, wireless smartphone connectivity, auto headlamps & wipers etc.) Mahindra XUV 3XO Cons The new edgy & outlandish design may not be to everyone's liking. Some love it, some don't. It is very polarizing Top-end variants are expensive. Not overpriced, but definitely higher than expected 295-liter boot is the smallest in the segment. There are cheaper hatchbacks that have a larger boot No proper diesel automatic option, just a jerky AMT which has no place in a premium crossover Light & disconnected steering is the biggest drawback in a competent handling package Mahindra's after-sales service quality is a hit or miss. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. Enquire now The Small SUV is one of the most popular car segments in Australia, and Indian manufacturer, Mahindra, are looking to establish themselves at the budget end of a market. However, this is currently the territory of the Chery Tiggo 4. The Tiggo 4 and the pre-facelift Tiggo 4 Pro offers a comfortable, well-equipped package with a very competitive price tag. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is not, in fact, C-3POs new set of wheels as its name would suggest, but it is the Indian-marques latest offering with budget and value conscious customers in mind, lining up the Tiggo 4 squarely in its crosshair. However, the small SUV space is as competitive as it is abundant, and the 3XO will not only go toe-to-toe with the Tiggo 4, but also its rivals including the likes of the MG ZS, GWM Haval Jolion and Hyundai Venue. But can the new Mahindra find its feet in its segment? And can it take on the Tiggo 4? Value for Money How much does the 2026 Mahindra XUV 3XO cost? In order to take the fight to the Tiggo 4 and other value offerings in the small SUV segment, Mahindra had to get the price of the XUV 3XO right. They did. With prices starting from $23,990 drive away for the entry-level AX5L trim level, The Mahindra XUV 3XO arrives as one of the most competitively priced offerings in the segment. Its price tag matches that of the entry-level Tiggo 4 to the dollar, and its the same story when you go one level up to the AX7L model, priced at $26,990 drive away. Until August 31st, 2025, both 3XO trim levels will be discounted by $500 for introductory pricing, temporarily undercutting the Tiggo-4 as a result. It stands out in Mahindras Australian range as the most modern-looking vehicle on offer and sets itself apart in what is becoming an increasingly uniform segment. The styling is angular and striking, sporting a diamond theme most evident in the headlight design, the accents placed on the exterior trim including on the tail lights, roof rails and rear bumper, and the diamond cut alloy wheels. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Height How To Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specifications, Review and Pricing January 4, 2025 by Santosh Bhunia The Mahindra XUV 3XO continues to be a popular choice in the compact SUV segment, thanks to its blend of stylish design, powerful performance, and cutting-edge features. With its premium interior and robust powertrains, the XUV3OO caters to urban drivers and adventure seekers alike. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. While it faces competition from models like the Tata Nexon, Kia Sonet, and Hyundai Venue, its unique offerings like a powerful diesel engine and advanced safety features help it carve out its own niche. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. Mahindra XUV 3XO Pros A truly premium crossover. Nice build, quality & refinement levels Cabin has enough space for 5. Quality-wise, the interior is more like a Hyundai Fantastic petrol & diesel engine line-up; they offer fast performance & good driveability Finally gets a smooth torque converter automatic with the turbo-petrol engines Wide variant spread ensures there's something for everyone A compliant ride with sorted road manners 5-star NCAP rating & kit. Level 2 ADAS, 6 airbags, ESP, ABS, all-wheel disc brakes, TPMS, seatbelt reminders for all & more Loaded to the gills with equipment (360-degree camera, big sunroof, drive modes, Harman Kardon audio system, wireless smartphone connectivity, auto headlamps & wipers etc.) Mahindra XUV 3XO Cons The new edgy & outlandish design may not be to everyone's liking. Some love it, some don't. It is very polarizing Top-end variants are expensive. Not overpriced, but definitely higher than expected 295-liter boot is the smallest in the segment. There are cheaper hatchbacks that have a larger boot No proper diesel automatic option, just a jerky AMT which has no place in a premium crossover Light & disconnected steering is the biggest drawback in a competent handling package Mahindra's after-sales service quality is a hit or miss. What Insider Skip to content What Insider Menu Menu Home Celebrity Singer YouTuber Entertainment News Exam Jobs Sports Auto Tools Calorie Calculator GPA Calculator Mortgage Calculator Federal Pension Calculator Sales Tax Calculator Height Calculator Estimate Your Childs Future Height How To Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specifications, Review and Pricing January 4, 2025 by Santosh Bhunia The Mahindra XUV 3XO continues to be a popular choice in the compact SUV segment, thanks to its blend of stylish design, powerful performance, and cutting-edge features. With its premium interior and robust powertrains, the XUV3OO caters to urban drivers and adventure seekers alike. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. While it faces competition from models like the Tata Nexon, Kia Sonet, and Hyundai Venue, its unique offerings like a powerful diesel engine and advanced safety features help it carve out its own niche. Enquire now The Small SUV is one of the most popular car segments in Australia, and Indian manufacturer, Mahindra, are looking to establish themselves at the budget end of a market. However, this is currently the territory of the Chery Tiggo 4. The Tiggo 4 and the pre-facelift Tiggo 4 Pro offers a comfortable, well-equipped package with a very competitive price tag. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is not, in fact, C-3POs new set of wheels as its name would suggest, but it is the Indian-marques latest offering with budget and value conscious customers in mind, lining up the Tiggo 4 squarely in its crosshair. However, the small SUV space is as competitive as it is abundant, and the 3XO will not only go toe-to-toe with the Tiggo 4, but also its rivals including the likes of the MG ZS, GWM Haval Jolion and Hyundai Venue. But can the new Mahindra find its feet in its segment? And can it take on the Tiggo 4? Value for Money How much does the 2026 Mahindra XUV 3XO cost? In order to take the fight to the Tiggo 4 and other value offerings in the small SUV segment, Mahindra had to get the price of the XUV 3XO right. They did. With prices starting from $23,990 drive away for the entry-level AX5L trim level, The Mahindra XUV 3XO arrives as one of the most competitively priced offerings in the segment. Its price tag matches that of the entry-level Tiggo 4 to the dollar, and its the same story when you go one level up to the AX7L model, priced at $26,990 drive away. Until August 31st, 2025, both 3XO trim levels will be discounted by $500 for introductory pricing, temporarily undercutting the Tiggo-4 as a result. Not only is the Mahindra XUV 3XO the joint cheapest small SUVs, its now also one of the cheapest new cars in Australia. 2026 Mahindra XUV 3XO Pricing: AX5L: $23,990 drive away AX7L: $26,990 drive away Options Metallic Paint (on all colours except white): $495 Are you interested in a Mahindra XUV 3XO and looking for the best price? Find a Deal! Exterior Styling Diamonds are Mahindra Despite wrapping a platform thats over a decade old, the Mahindra XUV 3XO arrives with a trendy, contemporary exterior design. It stands out in Mahindras Australian range as the most modern-looking vehicle on offer and sets itself apart in what is becoming an increasingly uniform segment. The styling is angular and striking, sporting a diamond theme most evident in the headlight design, the accents placed on the exterior trim including on the tail lights, roof rails and rear bumper, and the diamond cut alloy wheels. Additional touches such as the rear light bar and the two tone roof featured on some specs further aid in its effectiveness. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. The Diesel engine is 1498 cc while the Petrol engine is 1197 cc . option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. blend of stylish design, powerful performance, and cutting-edge features. With its premium interior and robust powertrains, the XUV3OO caters to urban drivers and adventure seekers alike. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. nodes.description: Fetch comprehensive details on Mahindra XUV 3XO features, including luxury and safety features, using multiple iterations, and combine the outputs from current and previous iterations as final output. The final output should be a comprehensive summary of all features along with detailed information on luxury and safety features in markdown format, formatted into sections and sub-sections for readability.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch comprehensive and exhaustive details on Mahindra XUV 3XO features, including all standard features, and detailed information on luxury and safety features. Use multiple iterations to gather information from different sources. In the final iteration, combine the outputs from current and previous iterations as a single, comprehensive final output. The final output should be formatted in markdown with sections such as 'Overview', 'Standard Features', 'Luxury Features', and 'Safety Features'. Each section should include detailed information and be well-structured for readability. Ensure that the final output is a single markdown document containing all the gathered information.

output.initial_thoughts: I need to refine the search to extract detailed information on the safety features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO. This is the final iteration, so I need to combine the results from previous iterations with the results from this search into a single comprehensive output.

code.CODE_1:
overview = previous_output[0]['output']['execution_result']['code_results']['result']['overview']
standard_features = previous_output[1]['output']['execution_result']['code_results']['result']['standard_features']
luxury_features = previous_output[2]['output']['execution_result']['code_results']['result']['luxury_features']
safety_features = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO safety features ADAS specifications', 8)

output = {
    'overview': overview,
    'standard_features': standard_features,
    'luxury_features': luxury_features,
    'safety_features': safety_features
}
code.CODE_2:
overview = previous_output[0]['output']['execution_result']['code_results']['result']['overview']
standard_features = previous_output[1]['output']['execution_result']['code_results']['result']['standard_features']
luxury_features = previous_output[2]['output']['execution_result']['code_results']['result']['luxury_features']
safety_features = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO safety rating Bharat NCAP Global NCAP', 6)

output = {
    'overview': overview,
    'standard_features': standard_features,
    'luxury_features': luxury_features,
    'safety_features': safety_features
}

Quality-wise, the interior is more like a Hyundai Fantastic petrol & diesel engine line-up; they offer fast performance & good driveability Finally gets a smooth torque converter automatic with the turbo-petrol engines Wide variant spread ensures there's something for everyone A compliant ride with sorted road manners 5-star NCAP rating & kit. What Insider Skip to content What Insider Menu Menu Home Celebrity Singer YouTuber Entertainment News Exam Jobs Sports Auto Tools Calorie Calculator GPA Calculator Mortgage Calculator Federal Pension Calculator Sales Tax Calculator Height Calculator Estimate Your Childs Future Height How To Mahindra XUV 3XO: Specifications, Review and Pricing January 4, 2025 by Santosh Bhunia The Mahindra XUV 3XO continues to be a popular choice in the compact SUV segment, thanks to its blend of stylish design, powerful performance, and cutting-edge features. With its premium interior and robust powertrains, the XUV3OO caters to urban drivers and adventure seekers alike. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. While it faces competition from models like the Tata Nexon, Kia Sonet, and Hyundai Venue, its unique offerings like a powerful diesel engine and advanced safety features help it carve out its own niche. Enquire now The Small SUV is one of the most popular car segments in Australia, and Indian manufacturer, Mahindra, are looking to establish themselves at the budget end of a market. However, this is currently the territory of the Chery Tiggo 4. The Tiggo 4 and the pre-facelift Tiggo 4 Pro offers a comfortable, well-equipped package with a very competitive price tag. The Mahindra XUV 3XO is not, in fact, C-3POs new set of wheels as its name would suggest, but it is the Indian-marques latest offering with budget and value conscious customers in mind, lining up the Tiggo 4 squarely in its crosshair. However, the small SUV space is as competitive as it is abundant, and the 3XO will not only go toe-to-toe with the Tiggo 4, but also its rivals including the likes of the MG ZS, GWM Haval Jolion and Hyundai Venue. But can the new Mahindra find its feet in its segment? And can it take on the Tiggo 4? Value for Money How much does the 2026 Mahindra XUV 3XO cost? In order to take the fight to the Tiggo 4 and other value offerings in the small SUV segment, Mahindra had to get the price of the XUV 3XO right. They did. With prices starting from $23,990 drive away for the entry-level AX5L trim level, The Mahindra XUV 3XO arrives as one of the most competitively priced offerings in the segment. Its price tag matches that of the entry-level Tiggo 4 to the dollar, and its the same story when you go one level up to the AX7L model, priced at $26,990 drive away. Until August 31st, 2025, both 3XO trim levels will be discounted by $500 for introductory pricing, temporarily undercutting the Tiggo-4 as a result. Not only is the Mahindra XUV 3XO the joint cheapest small SUVs, its now also one of the cheapest new cars in Australia. 2026 Mahindra XUV 3XO Pricing: AX5L: $23,990 drive away AX7L: $26,990 drive away Options Metallic Paint (on all colours except white): $495 Are you interested in a Mahindra XUV 3XO and looking for the best price? Find a Deal! Exterior Styling Diamonds are Mahindra Despite wrapping a platform thats over a decade old, the Mahindra XUV 3XO arrives with a trendy, contemporary exterior design. It stands out in Mahindras Australian range as the most modern-looking vehicle on offer and sets itself apart in what is becoming an increasingly uniform segment. The styling is angular and striking, sporting a diamond theme most evident in the headlight design, the accents placed on the exterior trim including on the tail lights, roof rails and rear bumper, and the diamond cut alloy wheels. Additional touches such as the rear light bar and the two tone roof featured on some specs further aid in its effectiveness. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. The all-new Mahindra XUV 3XO has an ample ground clearance of 201 mm, making it easy for you to drive on rocky terrains. In addition, the XUV 3XO comes with a command seating position to offer an exhilarating driving experience. The Mahindra XUV 3XO has LED DRLs and headlamps that will lead the road to envy you whenever you turn them on. Furthermore, the infinity tail lamps add an X factor to your style quotient. The car also features 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels for that sporty look. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Dimensions 2. Comforting Interior When you drive the Mahindra XUV 3XO, it elevates your every journey. Stepping inside the XUV 3XOs cabin will let you discover a sanctuary of sophistication and comfort. It is one of the key parts of the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained, as it has a meticulous design for the finest SUV lovers. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a Skyroof and soft-touch leatherette on the door trims and dashboard. Furthermore, the car has premium leatherette seats, a cooled glovebox with illumination, and a passive keyless entry. It also features a front armrest with storage and a console with a cup holder for a comfortable drive. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior 3. Smart Connectivity Another key Mahindra XUV 3XO configuration is its smart connectivity and technology. The car comes with a Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system to make your drive enjoyable. In addition, the sound system lets you experience sonic expanse, and the bass enhancer technology uplifts your mood while driving in crowded areas. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a high-definition touchscreen system for infotainment and navigation and has built-in Amazon Alexa for entertainment. option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Explained: A Comprehensive Guide. Published on 27 Aug, 2024, 9:41 AM IST Updated on 28 Aug, 2024, 5:59 AM IST Team Ackodrive 8 min read Interesting Articles Follow us on Share Post Mahindra recently launched the much-awaited Mahindra XUV 3XO as a compact SUV in the Indian automotive industry. Outperforming its rivals, the Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue and Maruti Suzuki Brezza, the Mahindra XUV 3XO brings a fresh look to the segment. With the latest updates and comfortable features, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is on the list of must-buy compact SUVs in India. Here, we will take a closer look at the Mahindra XUV 3XO features explained and help you choose the ideal car. Contents Price of Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants After the Mahindra XUV 3XO features are explained, you must know the price of each variant. Hence, we have prepared a table for you highlighting the ex-showroom price of each XUV 3XO variant: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variant Ex-Showroom Price MX1 Rs. 7.49 Lakhs MX2 Rs. 9.99 Lakhs MX2 PRO Rs. 8.99 Lakhs to Rs. 10.39 Lakhs MX3 Rs. 9.49 Lakhs to Rs. 11.68 Lakhs MX3 PRO Rs. 9.99 Lakhs to Rs. 11.49 Lakhs AX5 Rs. 10.69 Lakhs to Rs. 12.88 Lakhs AX5 Luxury Rs. 11.99 Lakhs to Rs. 13.49 Lakhs AX7 Rs. 12.49 Lakhs to Rs. 14.49 Lakhs AX7 Luxury Rs. 13.99 Lakhs to Rs. 15.49 Lakhs Note : The prices of the Mahindra XUV 3XO variants can change without any prior notice. So, before booking your car, talk with your nearest dealer to know the latest price. Check out: Mahindra XUV 3XO Variants Unlatch Elated Driving Experience with the All New Mahindra XUV 3XO Making its presence felt in the Indian compact SUV market, the Mahindra XUV 3XO is one of the best cars in this segment manufactured by Mahindra. It offers more convenience and comfort when driving on different terrains. The following are detailed discussions of the Mahindra XUV 3XO tech specs and features: 1. Influencing Exterior Look The Mahindra XUV 3XO has a specific design to turn heads with its athletic stance. It commands respect and exudes the confidence of a true SUV. Mahindra XUV 3XOSpecifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO is offered with both petrol and diesel engine options, making it a versatile choice: Engine Options : 1.2-liter turbo-petrol 1.5-liter turbo-diesel Power Output : Petrol: 110 PS and 200 Nm torque Diesel: 117 PS and 300 Nm torque Transmission : 6-speed manual 6-speed AMT (automated manual transmission) Drivetrain : Front-wheel drive (FWD) Fuel Economy : Petrol: ~17 km/l Diesel: ~20 km/l Mahindra XUV 3XOPrice The Mahindra XUV 3XO is competitively priced, offering great value for its features. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price is 8,91,603. Base Variant : Starting at 8.50 lakh Top Variant : Up to 14.00 lakh (ex-showroom prices) Mahindra XUV 3XODimensions Despite its compact size, the Mahindra XUV 3XO offers ample cabin space and a commanding road presence: Length : 3995 mm Width : 1821 mm Height : 1627 mm Wheelbase : 2600 mm Ground Clearance : 180 mm Mahindra XUV 3XOInterior and Features The Mahindra XUV 3XO boasts a feature-rich interior that combines comfort, convenience, and technology: Seating : Five-passenger capacity with premium fabric or leatherette upholstery Infotainment : 7-inch touchscreen system with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity : Built-in navigation, Bluetooth, and USB ports Climate Control : Dual-zone automatic climate control Sunroof : Available on higher trims Safety Features : Six airbags (top variant) Electronic Stability Program (ESP) ABS with EBD ISOFIX child seat mounts Mahindra XUV 3XOExterior Design The Mahindra XUV 3XO combines bold styling with functional elements: Front : Aggressive grille design with LED projector headlamps and DRLs Wheels : 16-inch alloy wheels (diamond-cut options on higher trims) Tail Lamps : LED wraparound design Paint Options : Multiple vibrant and dual-tone color schemes Mahindra XUV 3XOPerformance The Mahindra XUV 3XO delivers a confident and enjoyable driving experience, with its powerful engines and responsive handling: Ride Quality : Smooth over rough roads, thanks to a well-tuned suspension Steering : Light for city driving, with enough feedback for highways Driving Modes : Multi-drive modes to suit various conditions Mahindra XUV 3XOReview The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out in the compact SUV market with its impressive safety features, robust performance, and stylish design. Here are its strengths and areas for improvement: Strengths Safety : Leading safety features, including a 5-star Global NCAP rating for adult occupant protection Performance : Powerful diesel engine with class-leading torque Features : Segment-first dual-zone climate control and other premium features Comfort : Spacious cabin with supportive seats and excellent noise insulation Weaknesses Boot Space : At 257 liters, it offers less luggage capacity than competitors Fuel Efficiency : Petrol variants could improve on mileage Price : Top-end variants are on the pricier side for the segment Verdict The Mahindra XUV 3XO is an excellent choice for those seeking a feature-packed, safe, and powerful compact SUV. Quality-wise, the interior is more like a Hyundai Fantastic petrol & diesel engine line-up; they offer fast performance & good driveability Finally gets a smooth torque converter automatic with the turbo-petrol engines Wide variant spread ensures there's something for everyone A compliant ride with sorted road manners 5-star NCAP rating & kit. There are cheaper hatchbacks that have a larger boot No proper diesel automatic option, just a jerky AMT which has no place in a premium crossover Light & disconnected steering is the biggest drawback in a competent handling package Mahindra's after-sales service quality is a hit or miss.
